Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that the video shows a raid on illegal workers in Indonesia just before national elections, when in fact the video is from 2015 and not recent.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide any evidence or additional information to back up the assertion that the raid was conducted to disprove a hoax.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the raid was conducted hastily just before the presidential election without providing any evidence to support this assumption.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the video is not recent and does not show a raid on illegal workers from China.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider alternative explanations for the purpose of the raid or the timing of its release.
Falters at times: The claim falters by presenting the video as evidence of a recent raid on illegal workers when it is actually from 2015.
